page.shortlink: api client api a5 u object toquerystring method

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object to create the query string from.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: The settings object for the query string.

property.name: encode
property.description: If true (the default) then the query string will be encoded.

property.name: booleans
property.description: The settings for booleans in the query string.

property.name: truthy
property.description: The "true" value to use in the query string. The default is ".t." for XBasic true.

property.name: falsy
property.description: The "false" value to use in the query string. The default is ".f." for XBasic false.

page.description: Create a query string from an object.
